name: Maggie_Brown
text:
Maggie Brown
Maggie Brown was the dispatcher for the Twin Peaks Sheriff's Department.
Biography
When Sheriff Frank Truman returned from a fishing trip, Maggie filled him in on a few calls they had during his absence, including the drug overdose of Denny Craig.
Maggie later expressed disbelief at Deputy Chad Broxford's cruel remarks about Doris Truman as well as the Trumans' son who committed suicide.
